message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $160?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would it be possible to lower the price to $150?
